topic_metadata.title: How to prevent a table cell from being split across pages?

posts.name: Aurélien
posts.cooked:
Hello,
I have a problem with my table. When a line is too long and exceed on another page, it will just split the line on the two pages instead of starting the line of the table on the next page. Someone know if it’s possible to fix it and how ?
